charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1101_0100_2:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
accompanied Brendan and Groudon on
their training.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1101_0200_2:
Even as a training partner, Groudon was
incredibly powerful.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_0600_1: Even in this form, Groudon has incredible strength.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_0700_1:
But when it regains its true form through Primal
Reversion, it can unleash its true power.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_0800_1:
I hear it can cause magma to erupt and even
expand the landmass of the world!
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_0900_1: And what’s more, according to Hoenn legends...
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1000_1:
Groudon saved people from floods by evaporating
heavy rainfalls.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1100_1:
In other words, Groudon’s power is that of
nature itself.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1200_1:
Controlling nature and saving humans is on a
whole different scale.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1300_1:
That’s why it’d be disastrous if Groudon’s power
were misused.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1400_1:
I’ve...actually seen that happen, in the
Hoenn region.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1500_1: I feel kinda proud to be Groudon’s partner, but...
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1600_1:
I’ve gotta stay vigilant about Groudon’s
natural energy.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1700_1:
That’s why, when it comes to Groudon, I need to
seriously think things through!
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1800_1:
I gotta consider how to treat Groudon, how to
connect with it as a partner...
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_1900_1: and what I can do to be a suitable Trainer!
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_0401_2200_1: You’re sure I can handle it, huh.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_0402_2500_1:
It’s good to hear you say that—and to know you
believe in me.
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_2600_1: I’ve gotta have more faith in myself!
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_2700_1:
Since you’re showing ME support, I’ll do my best
not to let you down, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_2800_1:
Together, Groudon and I will become a sync pair
everyone can look up to—a pair with our hearts
in the right place!
charaepi_ch0019_90_yuki/2301_1201_2900_1: Because that’s my duty now, as a Neo Champion!
